Adrian College

A modern liberal arts college recognized as the #1 Up-and-Coming College in the Midwest.

Overview

Adrian College is a modern liberal arts college that has been recognized by the U.S. News & World Report as the #1 Up-and-Coming College in the Midwest. With that much press, a new website designed specifically for incoming students and existing was in need.

Creative Direction, Art Direction, Design - UnitOneNine

Admissions, Admissions, Admissions

Special attention was paid to the admissions page. We wanted students to get a friendlier story of the amenities, history and college statistics in a format students would understand.
